name: autonomous-video-generation-from-3d-gaussian-splatting
description: ## Repository Layout - `Report.pdf` – project write-up. - `src/` – core pipeline modules (explorer, detector, path planner, renderer, entry point). - `configs/` – YAML configs; defaults in `config.yaml`. - `outputs/scene_1/` – sample output folder for videos, detections, and selections.
